titles: A letter sent from both Houses of Parliament, to all the high-sheriffs of this kingdom, concerning the late propositions for Ireland.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: March 11. London, Printed for Ioseph Hunscott,
notes: The propositions were intended to be published at the Lent Assizes and other convenient times to receive subscriptions for the settling of 2.5 million acres of land in Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Land settlement --  Ireland --  Early works to 1800.
